title: Angular workspace configuration
contents:
mode_edit

Angular 工作區配置link

Angular workspace configurationlink

Angular 工作區根目錄下的 angular.json 檔案提供了全工作區級的配置和具體專案的預設配置，供 Angular CLI 中的建構工具和開發工具使用。此配置中所提供的路徑值都是相對於工作區根目錄的。

The angular.json file at the root level of an Angular workspace provides workspace-wide and project-specific configuration defaults. These are used for build and development tools provided by the Angular CLI. Path values given in the configuration are relative to the root workspace directory.

JSON 的總體結構link

General JSON structurelink

在 angular.json 的最上層，一些屬性用於配置工作區，其中的 projects 區則包含其餘的針對每個專案的配置項。CLI 在工作區級的預設設定可以被專案級的設定所覆蓋，而專案級的設定可以被命令列中的設定所覆蓋。

At the top-level of angular.json, a few properties configure the workspace and a projects section contains the remaining per-project configuration options. You can override Angular CLI defaults set at the workspace level through defaults set at the project level. You can also override defaults set at the project level using the command line.

下列屬性位於檔案的最上層，用於配置工作區。

The following properties, at the top-level of the file, configure the workspace.

屬性Properties 詳情Details
version 該配置檔案的版本The configuration-file version.
newProjectRoot 用來建立新工程的位置。絕對路徑或相對於工作區目錄的路徑。Path where new projects are created. Absolute or relative to the workspace directory.
cli 一組用於自訂 Angular CLI 的選項。參見 Angular CLI 配置選項部分。A set of options that customize the Angular CLI. See the CLI configuration options section.
schematics 一組原理圖，用於客製 ng generate 子命令在本工作區中的預設選項。參閱產生器原理圖。A set of schematics that customize the ng generate sub-command option defaults for this workspace. See the Generation schematics section.
projects 對於工作區中的每個應用或庫都會包含一個子分割槽，子分割槽中是每個專案的配置項。Contains a subsection for each library or application in the workspace, with the per-project configuration options.

你透過 ng new app_name 命令建立的初始應用會列在 projects 目錄下：

The initial application that you create with ng new app_name is listed under "projects":

"projects": { "app_name": { … } … }

當你使用 ng generate library 建立函式庫專案時，庫專案也會新增到 projects 節。

When you create a library project with ng generate library, the library project is also added to the projects section.

注意：
配置檔案的 projects 節與工作區的檔案結構並不完全對應。

NOTE:
The projects section of the configuration file does not correspond exactly to the workspace file structure.

  • ng new 建立的這個初始應用位於工作區檔案結構的最上層

    The initial application created by ng new is at the top level of the workspace file structure

  • 其它應用和庫位於工作區的 projects 資料夾中

    Other applications and libraries go into a projects directory in the workspace

欲知詳情，參閱工作區和專案檔案結構。

For more information, see Workspace and project file structure.

Angular CLI 配置選項link

Angular CLI configuration optionslink

下列配置屬性是 Angular CLI 的一組自訂選項。

The following configuration properties are a set of options that customize the Angular CLI.

屬性Property 詳情Details 值的型別Value type
analytics 與 Angular 團隊共享匿名使用資料。Share anonymous usage data with the Angular Team. boolean | ci
cache 控制 Angular CLI 建構器使用的持久化磁碟快取。Control persistent disk cache used by Angular CLI Builders. 快取選項Cache options
schematicCollections 要使用的預設原理圖集的列表。A list of default schematics collections to use. string[]
packageManager 要使用的首選套件管理器工具。The preferred package manager tool to use. npm | cnpm | pnpm |yarn
warnings 控制 Angular CLI 特定的控制檯警告。Control Angular CLI specific console warnings. 警告選項Warnings options

快取選項link

Cache optionslink

屬性Property 詳情Details 值的型別Value type 預設值Default value
enabled 配置是否啟用磁碟快取。Configure whether disk caching is enabled. boolean true
environment 配置在哪個環境中啟用磁碟快取。Configure in which environment disk cache is enabled. local | ci | all local
path 用於儲存快取結果的目錄。The directory used to stored cache results. string .angular/cache

警告選項link

Warnings optionslink

屬性Property 詳情Details 值的型別Value type 預設值Default value
versionMismatch 當全域 Angular CLI 版本比本地版本更新時顯示警告。Show a warning when the global Angular CLI version is newer than the local one. boolean true

專案配置選項link

Project configuration optionslink

每個專案的 projects:<project_name> 下都有以下最上層配置屬性。

The following top-level configuration properties are available for each project, under projects:<project_name>.

"my-app": { "root": "", "sourceRoot": "src", "projectType": "application", "prefix": "app", "schematics": {}, "architect": {} }
屬性Property 詳情Details
root 該專案的根資料夾，相對於工作區資料夾的路徑。初始應用的值為空，因為它位於工作區的最上層。The root directory for this project's files, relative to the workspace directory. Empty for the initial application, which resides at the top level of the workspace.
sourceRoot 該專案原始檔的根資料夾。The root directory for this project's source files.
projectType "application" 或 "library" 之一。應用可以在瀏覽器中獨立執行，而庫則不行。One of "application" or "library" An application can run independently in a browser, while a library cannot.
prefix Angular 所產生的選擇器的字首字串。可以自訂它，以作為應用或功能區的標識。A string that Angular prepends to created selectors. Can be customized to identify an application or feature area.
schematics 一組原理圖（schematic），它可以為該專案自訂 ng generate 子命令的預設選項。參見產生原理圖部分。A set of schematics that customize the ng generate sub-command option defaults for this project. See the Generation schematics section.
architect 為本專案的各個建構器目標配置預設值。Configuration defaults for Architect builder targets for this project.

產生（Generation）原理圖link

Generation schematicslink

Angular 產生器的原理圖是一組用來修改專案的指南，包括新增新檔案或修改現有檔案。預設情況下，Angular CLI 的 ng generate 子命令會從 @schematics/angular 套件中收集原理圖。可以用 schematic-package:schematic-name 格式來為子命令指定原理圖名稱；比如，用來產生元件的原理圖名叫 @schematics/angular:component。

Angular generation schematics are instructions for modifying a project by adding files or modifying existing files. Individual schematics for the default Angular CLI ng generate sub-commands are collected in the package @schematics/angular. Specify the schematic name for a subcommand in the format schematic-package:schematic-name; for example, the schematic for generating a component is @schematics/angular:component.

供 Angular CLI 產生專案及其部件的預設原理圖的 JSON 模式（schema）位於 @schematics/angular 套件中。 這個模式描述了 Angular CLI ng generate 子命令的每個選項，它們會顯示在 --help 的輸出中。

The JSON schemas for the default schematics used by the Angular CLI to create projects and parts of projects are collected in the package @schematics/angular. The schema describes the options available to the Angular CLI for each of the ng generate sub-commands, as shown in the --help output.

這個模式中的每個欄位都對應於 Angular CLI 子命令選項的引數取值範圍和預設值。你可以修改此名稱空間的模式檔案，來為某個子命令選項指定另外的預設值。

The fields given in the schema correspond to the allowed argument values and defaults for the Angular CLI sub-command options. You can update your workspace schema file to set a different default for a sub-command option.

專案工具的配置選項link

Project tool configuration optionslink

建築師（Architect）是 Angular CLI 用來執行復雜任務（比如編譯和測試執行）的工具。Architect 是一個根據目標配置執行指定的建構器以完成指定任務的外殼。你可以定義和配置新的建構器和目標以擴充 Angular CLI。請參閱 Angular CLI 建構器。

Architect is the tool that the Angular CLI uses to perform complex tasks, such as compilation and test running. Architect is a shell that runs a specified builder to perform a given task, according to a target configuration. You can define and configure new builders and targets to extend the Angular CLI. See Angular CLI Builders.

預設的建築師建構器和目標link

Default Architect builders and targetslink

Angular 定義了用於特定命令或常規 ng run 命令的預設建構器。為每個預設建構器定義選項和預設值的 JSON 模式收集在 @angular-devkit/build-angular 套件中。這些架構為以下建構器配置選項。

Angular defines default builders for use with specific commands, or with the general ng run command. The JSON schemas that define the options and defaults for each of these default builders are collected in the @angular-devkit/build-angular package. The schemas configure options for the following builders.

  • 應用程式外殼

    app-shell

  • 瀏覽器

    browser

  • 開發伺服器

    dev-server

  • 提取-i18n

    extract-i18n

  • 業力

    karma

  • 伺服器

    server

配置建構器目標link

Configuring builder targetslink

angular.json 的 architect 部分包含一組建築目標。很多目標都對應於執行它們的 Angular CLI 命令。使用 ng run 命令可以執行一些額外的預定義目標，並可以定義自己的目標。

The architect section of angular.json contains a set of Architect targets. Many of the targets correspond to the Angular CLI commands that run them. Some extra predefined targets can be run using the ng run command, and you can define your own targets.

每個目標物件都指定了該目標的 builder，它是建築師所執行工具的 npm 套件。此外，每個目標都有一個 options 部分，用於配置該目標的預設選項，configurations 部分可以為目標命名並指定備用配置。參閱稍後的建構目標部分的例子。

Each target object specifies the builder for that target, which is the npm package for the tool that Architect runs. Each target also has an options section that configures default options for the target, and a configurations section that names and specifies alternative configurations for the target. See the example in Build target below.

"architect": { "build": {}, "serve": {}, "e2e" : {}, "test": {}, "lint": {}, "extract-i18n": {}, "server": {}, "app-shell": {} }
節Sections 詳情Details
architect/build 會為 ng build 命令的選項配置預設值。更多資訊，參閱建構目標部分。Configures defaults for options of the ng build command. See the Build target section for more information.
architect/serve 覆蓋建構預設值，併為 ng serve 命令提供額外的伺服器預設值。除了 ng build 命令的可用選項之外，還增加了與開發伺服器有關的選項。Overrides build defaults and supplies extra serve defaults for the ng serve command. Besides the options available for the ng build command, it adds options related to serving the application.
architect/e2e 覆蓋了建構選項預設值，以便用 ng e2e 命令建構端到端測試應用。Overrides build-option defaults for building end-to-end testing applications using the ng e2e command.
architect/test 覆蓋測試時的建構選項預設值，併為 ng test 命令提供額外的預設值以供執行測試。Overrides build-option defaults for test builds and supplies extra test-running defaults for the ng test command.
architect/lint 為 ng lint 命令配置了預設值選項，ng lint 用於對專案原始檔進行程式碼分析。Configures defaults for options of the ng lint command, which performs code analysis on project source files.
architect/extract-i18n 為 ng extract-i18n 命令的選項配置了預設值，該命令用於從原始碼中提取帶標記的訊息串，並輸出翻譯檔案。Configures defaults for options of the ng extract-i18n command, which extracts marked message strings from source code and outputs translation files.
architect/server 用於為使用 ng run <project>:server 命令建立帶伺服器端渲染的 Universal 應用配置預設值。Configures defaults for creating a Universal application with server-side rendering, using the ng run <project>:server command.
architect/app-shell 配置了使用 ng run <project>:app-shell 命令為漸進式 Web 應用（PWA）配置建立應用外殼時的預設值。Configures defaults for creating an application shell for a progressive web application (PWA), using the ng run <project>:app-shell command.

一般來說，可以為 Angular CLI 參考手冊中列出的每個命令配置相應的預設值。

In general, the options for which you can configure defaults correspond to the command options listed in the Angular CLI reference page for each command.

注意：
配置檔案中的所有選項都必須使用 camelCase，而不是 dash-case。

NOTE:
All options in the configuration file must use camelCase, rather than dash-case.

建構目標link

Build targetlink

architect/build 節會為 ng build 命令的選項配置預設值。它具有下列最上層屬性。

The architect/build section configures defaults for options of the ng build command. It has the following top-level properties.

屬性PROPERTY 詳情Details
builder 用於建構此目標的建構工具的 npm 套件。預設為 @angular-devkit/build-angular:browser，它使用的是 webpack 打包器。
注意：當建構庫（ng build myLib）時使用了不同的建構器。
The npm package for the build tool used to create this target. The default builder for an application (ng build myApp) is @angular-devkit/build-angular:browser, which uses the webpack package bundler.
NOTE: A different builder is used for building a library (ng build myLib).
options 本節包含建構選項的預設值，當沒有指定命名的備用配置時使用。參閱預設建構選項。This section contains default build target options, used when no named alternative configuration is specified. See the Default build targets section.
configurations 本節定義並命名針對不同目標的備用配置。它為每個命名配置都包含一節，用於設定該目標環境的預設選項。參閱備用的建構配置。This section defines and names alternative configurations for different intended destinations. It contains a section for each named configuration, which sets the default options for that intended environment. See the Alternate build configurations section.

備用的建構配置link

Alternate build configurationslink

Angular CLI 具有兩種建構配置：production 和 development。預設情況下，ng build 命令使用 production 配置，該配置將應用許多建構最佳化，包括：

Angular CLI comes with two build configurations: production and development. By default, the ng build command uses the production configuration, which applies several build optimizations, including:

  • 打包檔案

    Bundling files

  • 最小化多餘的空白

    Minimizing excess whitespace

  • 刪除註釋和無效程式碼

    Removing comments and dead code

  • 重寫程式碼，以使用簡短、混亂的名稱，也叫最小化

    Rewriting code to use short, mangled names, also known as minification

你可以定義和命名適用於你的開發過程的其它備用配置（比如 stage）。其它建構配置的一些例子是 AIO 自己使用的 stable、archive、next，以及建構本地化版本應用所需的各個與區域有關的配置置。欲知詳情，參閱國際化（i18n）。

You can define and name extra alternate configurations (such as stage, for instance) appropriate to your development process. Some examples of different build configurations are stable, archive, and next used by Angular.io itself, and the individual locale-specific configurations required for building localized versions of an application. For details, see Internationalization (i18n).

你可以透過將它們的名稱傳給 --configuration 命令列標誌來選擇替代配置。

You can select an alternate configuration by passing its name to the --configuration command line flag.

你還可以用逗號分隔的列表傳入多個配置名稱。比如，要同時應用 stage 和 fr 建構配置，請使用命令 ng build --configuration stage,fr。在這種情況下，該命令從左到右解析命名的配置。如果多個配置更改了同一個設定，則最後設定的值生效。所以，在這個例子中，如果同時配置了 stage 和 fr，則會使用 fr 中設定的輸出路徑的值。

You can also pass in more than one configuration name as a comma-separated list. For example, to apply both stage and fr build configurations, use the command ng build --configuration stage,fr. In this case, the command parses the named configurations from left to right. If multiple configurations change the same setting, the last-set value is the final one. In this example, if both stage and fr configurations set the output path the value in fr would get used.

額外的建構和測試選項link

Extra build and test optionslink

ng build、ng serve 和 ng test 命令的可配置選項通常與 ng build、ng serve 和 ng test 命令的可用選項一一對應。關於這些選項及其取值範圍的更多資訊，參閱“ CLI 參考手冊”。

The configurable options for a default or targeted build generally correspond to the options available for the ng build, ng serve, and ng test commands. For details of those options and their possible values, see the Angular CLI Reference.

一些額外的選項（如下所列）只能透過配置檔案來設定，可以直接編輯，也可以使用 ng config 命令。

Some extra options can only be set through the configuration file, either by direct editing or with the ng config command.

選項屬性Options properties 詳情Details
assets 一個物件，包含一些用於新增到專案的全域上下文中的靜態檔案路徑。它的預設路徑指向專案的圖示檔案及專案的 assets 資料夾。參閱專案資產（asset）配置部分。An object containing paths to static assets to add to the global context of the project. The default paths point to the project's icon file and its assets directory. See more in the Assets configuration section.
styles 一個物件，包含一些要新增到專案全域上下文中的樣式檔案。Angular CLI 支援 CSS 匯入和所有主要的 CSS 預處理器：sass/scss 和 less。參閱 樣式和指令碼配置部分。An array of style files to add to the global context of the project. Angular CLI supports CSS imports and all major CSS preprocessors: sass/scss and less. See more in the Styles and scripts configuration section.
stylePreprocessorOptions 一個物件，包含要傳給樣式預處理器的選項"值-對"。參閱 樣式和指令碼配置 部分。An object containing option-value pairs to pass to style preprocessors. See more in the Styles and scripts configuration section.
scripts 一個物件，包含一些 JavaScript 指令碼檔案，用於新增到專案的全域上下文中。這些指令碼的載入方式和在 index.html 的 <script> 標籤中新增是完全一樣的。參閱 樣式和指令碼配置 部分。An object containing JavaScript script files to add to the global context of the project. The scripts are loaded exactly as if you had added them in a <script> tag inside index.html. See more in the Styles and scripts configuration section.
budgets 全部或部分應用的預設尺寸預算的型別和閾值。當建構的輸出達到或超過閾值大小時，你可以將建構器配置為報告警告或錯誤。參閱配置尺寸預算。（不適用於 test 部分。）Default size-budget type and thresholds for all or parts of your application. You can configure the builder to report a warning or an error when the output reaches or exceeds a threshold size. See Configure size budgets. (Not available in test section.)
fileReplacements 一個物件，包含一些檔案及其編譯時替代品。參閱為指定的目標配置檔案替換規則 部分。An object containing files and their compile-time replacements. See more in Configure target-specific file replacements.
index 配置應用的 HTML 索引的產生方式。欲知詳情，參見索引配置。（只在 browser 小節有效）Configures the generation of the application's HTML index. See more in Index configuration. (Only available in browser section.)

複雜配置的值link

Complex configuration valueslink

選項 assets、index、styles 和 scripts 的值可以是簡單的路徑字串，也可以是帶有特定欄位的物件值。可以使用命令標誌將 sourceMap 和 optimization 選項設定為簡單的布林值，但也可以使用配置檔案為其指定複雜的值。以下各節提供了在每種情況下如何使用這些複數值的詳細資訊。

The assets, index, styles, and scripts options can have either simple path string values, or object values with specific fields. The sourceMap and optimization options can be set to a simple Boolean value with a command flag. They can also be given a complex value using the configuration file. The following sections provide more details of how these complex values are used in each case.

專案資產（asset）配置link

Assets configurationlink

每個 build 目標配置都可以包含一個 assets 陣列，它列出了當你建構專案時要複製的檔案或資料夾。預設情況下，會複製 src/assets/ 資料夾和 src/favicon.ico。

Each build target configuration can include an assets array that lists files or folders you want to copy as-is when building your project. By default, the src/assets/ directory and src/favicon.ico are copied over.

"assets": [ "src/assets", "src/favicon.ico" ]

要排除某個資產，可以從這份資產配置中刪除它。

To exclude an asset, you can remove it from the assets configuration.

你可以透過把資產指定為物件的形式來進一步配置要複製的資產，而不僅是相對於工作區根目錄的路徑。一個資產物件可以包含如下欄位。

You can further configure assets to be copied by specifying assets as objects, rather than as simple paths relative to the workspace root. An asset specification object can have the following fields.

欄位Fields 詳情Details
glob 一個 node-glob 它使用 input 作為基準目錄。A node-glob using input as base directory.
input 相對於工作區根目錄的路徑。A path relative to the workspace root.
output 相對於 outDir 的路徑（預設為 dist/project-name）。為了杜絕安全隱患，Angular CLI 永遠不會在專案輸出路徑之外寫檔案。A path relative to outDir (default is dist/project-name). Because of the security implications, the Angular CLI never writes files outside of the project output path.
ignore 要排除的 glob 列表。A list of globs to exclude.
followSymlinks 允許這些 glob 模式追蹤目錄的符號連結。這樣會允許搜尋符號連結過來的子目錄。預設為 false。Allow glob patterns to follow symlink directories. This allows subdirectories of the symlink to be searched. Defaults to false.

比如，可以使用如下物件來更詳細地表達預設的資產路徑。

For example, the default asset paths can be represented in more detail using the following objects.

"assets": [ { "glob": "**/*", "input": "src/assets/", "output": "/assets/" }, { "glob": "favicon.ico", "input": "src/", "output": "/" } ]

你可以使用此擴充配置從專案外部複製資產。比如，以下配置會從 node 套件中複製資產：

You can use this extended configuration to copy assets from outside your project. For example, the following configuration copies assets from a node package:

"assets": [ { "glob": "**/*", "input": "./node_modules/some-package/images", "output": "/some-package/" } ]

node_modules/some-package/images/ 中的內容將會複製到 dist/some-package/ 中。

The contents of node_modules/some-package/images/ will be available in dist/some-package/.

下面的例子使用 ignore 欄位排除了 assets 資料夾中的某些特定檔案，防止它們被複制到 build 中：

The following example uses the ignore field to exclude certain files in the assets directory from being copied into the build:

"assets": [ { "glob": "**/*", "input": "src/assets/", "ignore": ["**/*.svg"], "output": "/assets/" } ]

樣式和指令碼配置link

Styles and scripts configurationlink

styles 和 scripts 選項的陣列型條目可以是簡單的路徑字串，也可以是指向額外入口點檔案的物件。其關聯的建構器將在建構過程中將該檔案及其依賴項作為單獨的捆綁套件進行載入。對於配置物件，你可以選擇使用 bundleName 欄位為該入口點命名捆綁套件。

An array entry for the styles and scripts options can be a simple path string, or an object that points to an extra entry-point file. The associated builder loads that file and its dependencies as a separate bundle during the build. With a configuration object, you have the option of naming the bundle for the entry point, using a bundleName field.

預設情況下捆綁套件會被注入這裡，但是你可以將 inject 設定為 false，以將捆綁套件從注入中排除。比如，以下物件值將建立並命名包含樣式和指令碼的套件，並將其從注入中排除：

The bundle is injected by default, but you can set inject to false to exclude the bundle from injection. For example, the following object values create and name a bundle that contains styles and scripts, and excludes it from injection:

"styles": [ { "input": "src/external-module/styles.scss", "inject": false, "bundleName": "external-module" } ], "scripts": [ { "input": "src/external-module/main.js", "inject": false, "bundleName": "external-module" } ]

你可以混合使用簡單和複雜的檔案參考來獲取樣式和指令碼。

You can mix simple and complex file references for styles and scripts.

"styles": [ "src/styles.css", "src/more-styles.css", { "input": "src/lazy-style.scss", "inject": false }, { "input": "src/pre-rename-style.scss", "bundleName": "renamed-style" }, ]

樣式預處理器選項link

Style preprocessor optionslink

在 Sass 中，你可以同時使用元件樣式和全域樣式的 includePaths 功能，從而可以新增將用來檢查匯入的額外基本路徑。

In Sass you can make use of the includePaths feature for both component and global styles. This allows you to add extra base paths that are checked for imports.

要新增路徑，請使用 stylePreprocessorOptions 選項：

To add paths, use the stylePreprocessorOptions option:

"stylePreprocessorOptions": { "includePaths": [ "src/style-paths" ] }

該資料夾中的檔案，比如 src/style-paths/_variables.scss，可以從專案中的任何位置匯入，而無需相對路徑：

Files in that directory, such as src/style-paths/_variables.scss, can be imported from anywhere in your project without the need for a relative path:

// src/app/app.component.scss // A relative path works @import '../style-paths/variables'; // But now this works as well @import 'variables';

注意：
如果要將其用於單元測試，則還需要向 test 建構器中新增某些樣式或指令碼。另請參閱在應用程式內部使用執行時全域函式庫。

NOTE:
You also need to add any styles or scripts to the test builder if you need them for unit tests. See also Using runtime-global libraries inside your application.

最佳化配置link

Optimization configurationlink

optimization 這個瀏覽器建構器選項可以是布林值或物件，以進行更精細的配置。此選項可對建構輸出進行各種最佳化，包括：

The optimization browser builder option can be either a Boolean or an Object for more fine-tune configuration. This option enables various optimizations of the build output, including:

  • 指令碼和樣式的最小化

    Minification of scripts and styles

  • 搖樹最佳化

    Tree-shaking

  • 消除死程式碼

    Dead-code elimination

  • 內聯關鍵 CSS

    Inlining of critical CSS

  • 字型內聯

    Fonts inlining

有幾個選項可用於微調應用程式的最佳化方式。

Several options can be used to fine-tune the optimization of an application.

選項Options 詳情Details 值的型別Value type 預設值Default value
scripts 啟用指令碼輸出最佳化。Enables optimization of the scripts output. boolean true
styles 啟用樣式輸出最佳化。Enables optimization of the styles output. boolean | 樣式最佳化選項boolean | Styles optimization options true
fonts 啟用字型最佳化。
注意：
這需要進行國際網際網路存取。
Enables optimization for fonts.
NOTE:
This requires internet access.
boolean | 字型最佳化選項boolean | Fonts optimization options true

樣式最佳化選項link

Styles optimization optionslink

選項Options 詳情Details 值的型別Value type 預設值Default value
minify 最小化 CSS 定義，移除多餘的空格和註釋、合併識別符號，並對值進行最小化。Minify CSS definitions by removing extraneous whitespace and comments, merging identifiers and minimizing values. boolean true
inlineCritical 提取並內聯一些關鍵 CSS 定義，以提高首次內容繪製（FCP）效能。Extract and inline critical CSS definitions to improve First Contentful Paint. boolean true

字型最佳化選項link

Fonts optimization optionslink

選項Options 詳情Details 值的型別Value type 預設值Default value
inline 透過在應用的 index.html 中內聯外部 Google 字型和 Adobe 字型的 CSS 定義，來減少阻塞渲染的請求
注意：
這需要國際網際網路存取。
Reduce render blocking requests by inlining external Google Fonts and Adobe Fonts CSS definitions in the application's HTML index file.
NOTE:
This requires internet access.
boolean true

你可以提供如下值，以便應用其中的一項或幾項最佳化：

You can supply a value such as the following to apply optimization to one or the other:

"optimization": { "scripts": true, "styles": { "minify": true, "inlineCritical": true }, "fonts": true }

字型最佳化需要網際網路存取。當啟用它時，將會把外部 Google 字型和圖示的定義內聯在應用的 HTML 索引檔案中，從而縮減那些阻塞渲染的請求。

For Universal, you can reduce the code rendered in the HTML page by setting styles optimization to true.

Source map（原始碼對映）配置link

Source map configurationlink

sourceMap 這個瀏覽器建構器選項可以是 Boolean 或 Object，以進行更精細的配置以控制應用程式的原始碼對映。

The sourceMap browser builder option can be either a Boolean or an Object for more fine-tune configuration to control the source maps of an application.

選項Options 詳情Details 值的型別Value type 預設值Default value
scripts 為所有指令碼輸出原始碼對映檔案。Output source maps for all scripts. boolean true
styles 為所有樣式輸出原始碼對映檔案。Output source maps for all styles. boolean true
vendor 解析來自相依套件的原始碼對映資訊。Resolve vendor packages source maps. boolean false
hidden 為錯誤報告工具輸出原始碼對映檔案。Output source maps used for error reporting tools. boolean false

以下範例展示瞭如何切換一個或多個值以配置原始碼對映輸出：

The example below shows how to toggle one or more values to configure the source map outputs:

"sourceMap": { "scripts": true, "styles": false, "hidden": true, "vendor": true }

使用隱藏式原始碼對映時，捆綁套件中不會參考原始碼對映。如果你只希望在錯誤報告工具中透過原始碼對映對映錯誤堆疊追蹤時會很有用。隱藏原始碼對映就不會在瀏覽器開發工具中暴露你的原始碼對映。

When using hidden source maps, source maps are not referenced in the bundle. These are useful if you only want source maps to map error stack traces in error reporting tools. Hidden source maps don't expose your source maps in the browser developer tools.

索引配置link

Index configurationlink

配置應用的 HTML 索引的產生方式。

Configures the generation of the application's HTML index.

index 選項可以是字串，還可以用物件來對配置進行更多微調。

The index option can be either a String or an Object for more fine-tune configuration.

當以字串形式提供值時，指定路徑的檔名會被用於要產生的檔案，並將建立在應用程式配置的輸出路徑的根目錄中。

When supplying the value as a String the filename of the specified path will be used for the generated file and will be created in the root of the application's configured output path.

索引選項link

Index optionslink

選項Options 詳情Details 值的型別Value type 預設值Default value
input 供應用程式用來產生 HTML 索引的檔案的路徑。The path of a file to use for the application's generated HTML index. string
output 應用程式產生的HTML索引檔案的輸出路徑。將使用提供的完整路徑，並將其視為相對於應用程式配置的輸出路徑。The output path of the application's generated HTML index file. The full provided path will be used and will be considered relative to the application's configured output path. string index.html
